content: empower lace is inspired by the empower people 2020 craftivism movement and their purple cowl i hope you will knit this cowl or one of the others and wear it to vote in every election ----------------- thank you for knitting my patterns and supporting indie pattern design subscribe to my newsletter here 1 and get 15% off your first pattern order find me on instagram at @romidesigns 2 come by and say hello in my ravelry group @romi s studio 3 where you can find friendship pattern help and community use hashtags #empowerpeople2020 #romihill #romiphyle or #empowerlace to connect on social media 1 https //designsbyromi com/newsletter 2 https //instagram com/romidesigns/ 3 https //www ravelry com/groups/-romis-studio
